text: Ezɨ Filistian atriviba ghua kamaghɨn Delailan mɨgei, “Nɨ Samson apezeperegh, an gavgavim bagh an azaragh, a managh gavgavir ekiar kam isi, eghtɨ e manmaghɨra a damightɨ, an gavgavim aneteghtɨ, e anebɨragham. Nɨ an gun en mɨkemeghtɨ e an suiragh a ikegham. Nɨ kamaghɨn damightɨ e vaghvagh 1,100 silvan dagɨaba isɨ nɨ danɨngam.”
